relation: Deadline to Apply for Fall Quarter Graduation
Fall Class Schedule Available on Campus
Last Day to Drop With a W or Change to Audit for Summer
20/40 Payment Plan: Final Installment Due Today for Summer
Info Session: Technical Customer Service Representative Certificate
Deadline to Pay Tuition for Early Registration for Fall Quarter
Info Session: Technical Customer Service Representative Certificate
Registration Processing Closed for Fall Quarter
Financial Aid Deadline to Submit Supplemental Paperwork for Winter 2016
Summer Quarter Grades Posted to Transcripts
Are you planning to graduate at the end of Fall Quarter? Make sure you submit your Graduation Application today. Applications are submitted onlune through your MyEvCC Student Portal.
Fall Class Schedule Available on Campus
Today is the final day students are able to drop a class or change from credit status to audit status for Summer Quarter. Changing from credit to audit status requires Instructor Signature.

Today is the deadline to pay the final installment of the 20/40 payment plan for Summer Quarter 2015. You may pay with a credit card online through your MyEvCC Student Portal page or in person at the Cashiers Office in the Parks Student Union. Students who miss this payment risk being dropped from classes and will need to pay a fee to be reinstated in classes.
EvCC is open 7:30 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Monday-Thursday and closed on Fridays from June 16 to September 11. The College will return to a Monday-Friday schedule starting September 14.

Attend an Information Session and learn how you can begin training to become a Cosmetologist and start an exciting and rewarding career. Thursday, August 13, 2015 Beginning at 6:30 p.m. 9315 State Avenue, Suite G Marysville, WA 98270
EvCC is open 7:30 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Monday-Thursday and closed on Fridays from June 16 to September 11. The College will return to a Monday-Friday schedule starting September 14.

Learn about a nine-month certificate program, where you can qualify to work in a call center with employers such as Comcast, Frontier, PUD and Puget Sound Energy, many offering full-time positions with benefits. Find out about this fast-paced, growing industry at EverettCC.edu/TCSR

Today is the deadline to pay tuition for early registration for Fall quarter 2015. You may pay with a credit card online through your MyEvCC Student Portal page or in person at the Cashiers Office in the Parks Student Union. Students who miss this payment risk being dropped from classes.

Learn about a nine-month certificate program, where you can qualify to work in a call center with employers such as Comcast, Frontier, PUD and Puget Sound Energy, many offering full-time positions with benefits. Find out about this fast-paced, growing industry at EverettCC.edu/TCSR
Today registration for classes is closed. Registration reopens for all on August 20.
Summer Quarter classes end today. Prepare yourself for Final Exams, check the Finals schedule online or check with your Instructor.
Financial Aid deadline to submit all supplemental paperwork for Winter 2016.
EvCC is open 7:30 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Monday-Thursday and closed on Fridays from June 16 to September 11. The College will return to a Monday-Friday schedule starting September 14.

Students will be able to check their grades on their transcripts beginning today. If you check your transcript and do not see your grade posted, first check your class schedule; if you still do not see your grade or if you disagree with your grade contact your Instructor. The Enrollment Services office is unable to change, update, add or remove grades without the Instructor's written permission via a grade change form.

To provide real world knowledge and tools for Educators and support providers in the form of targeted workshops to better be prepare them to serve historically underserved student populations and to connect with their communities.
EvCC is open 7:30 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Monday-Thursday and closed on Fridays from June 16 to September 11. The College will return to a Monday-Friday schedule starting September 14.
